title: Hertz hires a former Goldman Sachs finance chief as its C.E.O. - The New York Times
content: Hertz hires a former Goldman Sachs finance chief as its C.E.O.  The New York Times
description: Stephen Scheer, who served as chief financial officer at Goldman Sachs until the end of last year, will take over Hertz and join its board on Feb. 28.
